# GSU Quarto 

To avoid using LaTeX and Word at all costs I have converted the GSU LaTeX template to be serviceable in Quarto.


## Installation

Run this command to install the templates in your Quarto project:

```bash
quarto add joshuafayallen/gsu-quarto-dissertation-template
```
